feed.title: Language Crash Courses
feed.subtitle: {"en"=>"Learn the basics of a language fast and for free! Language Crash Courses presents a unique 5-step learning method that is based on simply reading, listening and repeating as a native speaker reads a story. It’s the perfect way to get a taste of a language before going on a holiday or business trip. No need to struggle with grammar. Just enjoy and learn as you go. It's natural, intuitive, and best of all - it's fun!", "nl"=>"I need a text and translation :(", "es"=>"yo también"}
